meanings.definition: Relating to marriage or the relationship between spouses.
meanings.sent1: The couple enjoyed their conjugally blissful life together.
meanings.sent2: They lived in a conjugally committed relationship.
meanings.sent3: The conjugally united pair always made decisions together.
meanings.sent4: Their love was so strong, it felt conjugally intertwined.
meanings.sent5: The bond between them was truly conjugally unbreakable.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the union of a married couple.
meanings.sent1: They danced conjugally at their wedding reception.
meanings.sent2: The couple traveled conjugally to their favorite destinations.
meanings.sent3: They laughed conjugally at each other's jokes.
meanings.sent4: Their hearts beat conjugally as they walked hand in hand.
meanings.sent5: They whispered conjugally sweet nothings to each other every night.
